Serialized Form

  • Package <Unnamed>

    • Class Barrel

      class Barrel extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • gw
          IGatewayBrl gw
          The remote gateway interface used for communication with the gateway.
        • id
          int id
          The id of the barrel
        • invertedIndex
          HashMap<String,HashSet<String>> invertedIndex
          The hashmap used to store the inverted index.
        • linkedPage
          HashMap<String,HashSet<String>> linkedPage
          The hashmap used to store the linked pages of each page.
        • multicastSocket
          MulticastSocket multicastSocket
          The multicast socket used for communication.
        • pageLinks
          HashMap<String,HashSet<String>> pageLinks
          The hashmap used to store the links of each page.
        • running
          boolean running
          The boolean used to check if the barrel is running.
        • stopWords
          Set<String> stopWords
          The set of stop words to be ignored in the search.
        • title_citation
          HashMap<String,LinkedHashSet<String>> title_citation
          The hashmap used to store the title and citation of each page.

          The remote gateway interface used for communication with the gateway.

        • SERVER_PORT

    • Class Downloader

      class Downloader extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • citation
          String citation
          Citation information for the document being downloaded.
        • gw
          IGatewayDl gw
          The remote gateway interface used for communication with the gateway.
        • keywords
          ArrayList<String> keywords
          List extracted keywords.
        • MAX_THREADS
          int MAX_THREADS
          Maximum number of downloader threads.
        • MULTICAST_ADDR
          String MULTICAST_ADDR
          The multicast address to send information.
        • MULTICAST_PORT
          int MULTICAST_PORT
          The multicast port to send information.
        • multicastLock
          Object multicastLock
          Lock object for multicast operations.
        • multicastSocket
          DatagramSocket multicastSocket
          Multicast socket for communication.
        • queue
          Queue<String> queue
          Queue of URLs to be downloaded.
        • queueSemaphore
          Semaphore queueSemaphore
          Semaphore for controlling access to the download queue.
        • running
          Boolean running
          Flag indicating whether the downloader is running.
        • SERVER_IP_ADDRESS
          String SERVER_IP_ADDRESS
          The IP address of the gateway RMI server.
        • SERVER_PORT
          String SERVER_PORT
          The port of the gateway RMI server.
        • stopWords
          Set<String> stopWords
          Set of stop words used in text processing.
        • title
          String title
          Title of the document being downloaded.
        • ulrsList
          ArrayList<String> ulrsList
          List of extracted URLs.

    • Class Gateway

      class Gateway extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • availableIds
          Set<Integer> availableIds
          Set of available IDs to reuse.
        • barrels
          ArrayList<IBarrel> barrels
          List of active barrels.
        • brlCount
          int brlCount
          Current number of barrels.
        • clients
          ArrayList<IClient> clients
          List of connected clients.
        • downloaderManager
          IDownloader downloaderManager
          The downloader manager responsible for handling download requests.
        • nextId
          int nextId
          The ID to assign to the next barrel.
        • SERVER_IP_ADDRESS
          String SERVER_IP_ADDRESS
          The IP address of the gateway RMI server.
        • SERVER_PORT
          int SERVER_PORT
          The port number of the gateway RMI server.
